TopicTitle: Speak like a Brit Mk II

Articles.Content: Bah, politics. I'm jolly well tired of their nonsense. All they do is bicker and argue while dabbling pointless merits of pointless things!

Did you fine chaps here about the jolly 'Murcian govt that got back up after a bloody fortnight and some shutdown?, bloody insane if you ask me.

I find the shilly-shallying of the colonials rather tiring old chap. Can't we talk about something civilised, like cricket?
Or the merits of one tea or another: I'm quite partial to tea, earl gray, hot( Patrick stewart is awesome)
I do hope you're not going to put milk in that, like some sort of barbarian.
I say! what do you have against coffee!

Bah, politics. I'm jolly well tired of their nonsense. All they do is bicker and argue while dabbling pointless merits of pointless things!

SO TURE i say!!

I say! what do you have against coffee!

Nothing, old bean. It's a perfectly suitable drink for those foreign types. But the refined palate of an Englishman demands tea!
Free tea for all the chaps then!
Hooray i say! bring out the tea old chap!
Bollocks! I just got mullered by me bloomin' teapot!
You what mate? Where's me f*beep*ing benefits you hear me mush I'll stab you give me your wallet
Hmmft! I'll have to school you in the way of fisticuffs, you bugger. C'mon then! *removes top hat*
A'rite moit, jus' be'cus ya mums forgot 'er unda'wear 'rand mai 'ouse agen don't mean ya gotta fite me.
I must say, this thread is quick active chaps!
Indeed! However we've been infested with some improper ruffians. The bloody drunkards think they own the jolly place!
Quite, they must be removed from the premises forthwith.
i say, what is all this bally nonsense about fighting, gentlemen we must rid this thread like we rid France of the germans
i say nay,this place has let me burn off some bloddy steam after a bad day!
Oi, Don you talk about my mother that way, mate. Il have you know i can get your knickers in a twist!
Jolly gosh, these blokes seem to have abandoned this thread!
Sittin there with that "what's going on here" look, slapped all over your Chevy Chase!
Oh heavens! These blokes have abandoned this thread again!
